Do you remember when the sound of internet dial-up was like running your nails on a chalkboard? At E Image, we remember plugging into the wall, connecting to the internet and thinking- "this is never going to work"!! Since then, E Image (formally Ralston and Ralston) has become a leader in web development, branding and marketing and has assisted hundreds of business enterprises, both locally and internationally elevate their visibility and stay relevant while substantially increasing revenues and profits.What separated us then and still holds true today? It is our innate ability to "stay ahead of the curve". While continuous change is now the norm... we believe in offering cohesive marketing under one roof while bridging relevant media and digital marketing to remain ahead of the curve.TIme and time again, we visit prospective clients only to learn their marketing is segmented rather than cohesive. The E Image team strives to offer a synergistic strategy across all multi-channels rather than a segmented broken approach. We believe... to stay relevant, especially in a world overflowing with talent, brimming with competitors, and filled with a growing number of voices competing for attention, the options are clear, let our experienced team assist you in "Staying ahead of the curve!".Under one roof; The latest SEARCH technology (dropdownbox.com), website development, digital advertising, search engine optimization, public relations, graphics, branding, logo, design, content, and packaging. E Image is also well versed in product development, manufacturing consulting, product distribution and business strategy.

Legacy Sports, LLC is currently engaged in the development of a state-of-the-art premiere family sports park facility incorporating athletics and sports entertainment that will be the largest privately owned multi-sport facility in the Western United States. The project will be developed in one single phase constructing outdoor and indoor team athletic facilities geared to high energy entertainment, sports venues. The outdoor facilities include the development of a multi-field soccer complex that includes twenty-two (22) soccer fields including one (1) soccer stadium-type expanded field, eight (8) softball fields including one (1) softball stadium field, one (1) adult baseball stadium field, four (4) little league / youth baseball and girls’ softball fields including one (1) stadium field, thirteen (13) sand volleyball courts including one (1) stadium court, and a thirty-six (36) pickleball court complex plus one (1) stadium court. The park will also feature an indoor basketball and volleyball building that will house seventeen (16) multi-purpose courts with one (1) stadium court. Also, included will be an Extreme Challenge Course with Zip Lines and an eight (8) lane batting cage training center using latest technologies. With its multiple playing fields for each venue, the sports park shall serve as a major regional hub for team training and competition at various levels of expertise and proficiency.

Marie's passion is enjoying life lived outside. Her deep love of the outdoors allows her to to see life in color and action, thus achieving exceptional results for the outdoor gear company.  Marie presides over  has  single-handedly spearheaded the media efforts  by branding its former spokesperson Tim Ralston locally, nationally and internationally.  Her efforts has landed the company hundreds of media appearances including on radio, television, magazines and digital newspapers.  From National Geographic, Fox, CNN, Men's Journal, Maxim, History Channel, NPR, TV Tokyo, The New York Times to BBC, Anderson Cooper, NBC, ABC...to name a few.  Under her guidance, the company offers the latest in outdoor gear, camping and hiking equipment as well as  adventure education by top experts. eCommerce store- GearUpCenter.com

summary: As CEO of E Image Agency, a Scottsdale based award-winning and internationally recognized Advertising Agency.  Marie’s career is highlighted by 20 years of marketing and web expertise as a top-tier international marketing professional. A seasoned marketing executive, Marie possesses extensive capabilities ranging from traditional and digital marketing, search engine optimization, creative including: branding, design, content and packaging. Additionally, Marie is well versed in product development, manufacturing consulting, product distribution and business strategy. Through her thorough understanding of marketing, she has assisted hundreds of inventors and business enterprises elevate their visibility while substantially increasing revenues and profits.  Ms. Ralston’s book of business includes media executives, high profile individuals including dignitaries and officials nationally and internationally. She is well respected and possesses strong relationships in China, Central America, South America and Spain. She is also Bi-lingual in English and Spanish.Latest Notable projects:International promotions of Gear Up Center with placement on hundreds of media venues including National Geographic, History Channel, Fox, CNN, Tokyo Today, Men's Journal, Maxim, BBC (to name a few), Intensive Brand development includes: Tim Ralston,  Crovel, Nax, X Caliber. The Opus Movie Premiere, Celebrity product placement;actor Patrick Dempsey. "In house" product inventions that have been manufactured, branded, marketed and distributed include: Z Pointe; Automatic Cosmetic pencil sharpener (International Distribution). Crovel Products- Multi-Tool (International Distribution), Floativa, (Television Distribution), Nax (International Distribution), X Caliber Adapters (International Distribution).Bilingual Spanish/English
